flawed_nl_solution:
Donny saves a total of $15+$28+$13 = $<<15+28+13=65>>65 across all 3 days
He spends half of his total savings which is $65*(1/2) = $<<65*(1/2)=65/2>>65/2
#### 65/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 56, not 65. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
